University

  • Cornell University
    • Metadata search using PageRank
      - Search engine which extracts anchor's from webpages using the PageRank algorithm
      - Fall 2007
    • Search using Latent Semantic Indexing (LSI)
      - Search engine that uses Latent Semantic Indexing to relate terms and documents through concepts within a concept space
      - Fall 2007
    • Administrator Management for Antiquity (Master's Project)
      - Add-on to Antiquity, a distributed storage system, to manage an Administrator's children nodes to improve the integrity of data stored on them
      - Summer 2007

      - Additional: I redesigned the Antiquity webpage and also compiled the following guides for the Antiquity project:
      • Installation Guide
      • User's Guide
      • Programmer's Guide
      • Tutorial

    • Sigma
